    • buildExit

      public static java.lang.String buildExit​(java.lang.String body) throws MalformedMessageException
      Creates a new exit message as an XML string
      Parameters:
      body - represents the body of the message
      Returns:
      a new exit message
      Throws:
      MalformedMessageException - if an error occurs during the creation of the message

    • buildConnection

      public static java.lang.String buildConnection​(java.lang.String body, java.lang.String nickname, java.lang.Boolean gameHost, java.lang.Integer playersNumber) throws MalformedMessageException
      Creates a new connection message as an XML string
      Parameters:
      body - represents the body of the message
      nickname - represents the player's chosen nickname
      gameHost - indicates if the player wants to create a new game or join an existing one
      playersNumber - represents the number of players associated to the new game (considered only when a new game is created)
      Returns:
      a new connection message
      Throws:
      MalformedMessageException - if an error occurs during the creation of the message

    • buildFaithUpdate

      public static java.lang.String buildFaithUpdate​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> faith, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<ItemStatus>> sections, java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> faithLorenzo, java.util.Optional<java.util.List<ItemStatus>> sectionsLorenzo, java.lang.String body) throws MalformedMessageException
      Creates a new faith update message as an XML string
      Parameters:
      faith - contains the position of each player inside the faith track

      body - represents the body of the message
      Returns:
      a new faith update message
      Throws:
      MalformedMessageException - if an error occurs during the creation of the message

      Creates a new buy card message as an XML string
      Parameters:
      color - represents the selected card's color
      level - represents the selected card's level
      slot - indicates the slot to insert the selected card
      id - represents the selected card's id
      body - represents the body of the message
      warehouse - contains the resources taken from the warehouse
      strongbox - contains the resources taken from the strongbox
      Returns:
      a new buy card message
      Throws:
      MalformedMessageException - if an error occurs during the creation of the message

    • BuildDoProduction

      public static java.lang.String BuildDoProduction​(boolean personal, java.lang.String developments, java.lang.String leaders, java.lang.String customMaterials, java.lang.String customProducts, java.lang.String warehouse, java.lang.String strongbox, java.lang.String body) throws MalformedMessageException
      Creates a new do production message as an XML string
      Parameters:
      personal - indicates the player's decision
      developments - contains the selected leader cards
      leaders - contains the selected development cards
      customMaterials - contains the custom materials
      customProducts - contains the custom products
      warehouse - contains the selected resources from the warehouse
      strongbox - contains the selected resources from the strongbox
      body - represents the body of the message
      Returns:
      a new do production message
      Throws:
      MalformedMessageException - if an error occurs during the creation of the message
